pt.title: Github workflows
pt.desc: O plugin Github Workflows fornece uma alternativa para acionar manualmente fluxos de trabalho do GitHub de dentro do seu componente Backstage.

pt.title: Gitlab Pipelines
pt.desc: O plugin de pipelines do Gitlab integra o GitlabCi com seu componente backstage de forma simples.

en.title: Github workflows
en.desc: The Github Workflows plugin provides an alternative for manually triggering GitHub workflows from within your Backstage component.

en.title: Gitlab Pipelines
en.desc: The Gitlab pipelines plugin integrates GitlabCi with its backstage component in a simple way.
